meanings.definition: Appealing to the taste or smell
meanings.sent1: The appetising aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared an appetising dish that made everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent3: The appetising scent of popcorn lured everyone to the movie theater.
meanings.sent4: The appetising flavors danced on my tongue like a delicious melody.
meanings.sent5: The appetising soup was like a warm hug on a cold day.

meanings.sent1: The appetising cake on display made me crave a slice.
meanings.sent2: The appetising advertisement for pizza made me hungry.
meanings.sent3: The appetising smell of barbecue made my stomach growl in anticipation.
meanings.sent4: The appetising menu items tempted me to order more than I could eat.
meanings.sent5: The appetising samples at the food fair left me wanting more.

meanings.sent1: The appetising colors of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent2: The appetising decorations at the party created a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The appetising display of flowers brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: The appetising packaging of the gift made it even more special.
meanings.sent5: The appetising presentation of the dish made it almost too beautiful to eat.
